title: Surveillance in Tech, 'Biracial Commercials,' and Obama's Drones with Edward Ongweso Jr
description:
Vice writer Edward Ongweso Jr joins the show to discuss surveillance by tech companies, Biden's 'Biracial Commercial' thoughts, the DOJ's antitrust lawsuit against Google, and more. Matt breaks down a recent piece from his substack, 'TK Media,' about the flailing efforts by democrats to pass the Covid relief package.
Merch Link: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
